sentences.sContent: an attempt to intercept drugs being smuggled over the border
sentences.sCn: 阻截毒品走私入境的努力

remMethod.val: inter (在…中间) + cept (拿) → 中途拿下 → 中途拦截

words.tran: 拦截，截住；截断，截取；侦听，窃听

trans.tranCn: 中途拦截， 截击， 截取
trans.tranOther: to stop something or someone that is going from one place to another before they get there
